items.text: The epistemological foundations of scientific inquiry have been subjected to rigorous philosophical scrutiny since the Enlightenment. Popper's falsificationism and Kuhn's paradigm shifts represent fundamentally different conceptions of how scientific knowledge progresses and accumulates over time.
items.translation_uz: Ilmiy tadqiqotning epistemologik asoslari Ma'rifatparvarlik davridan beri qattiq falsafiy tekshiruvga duchor bo'ldi. Popperning soxtalashtirilishi va Kunning paradigma siljishi ilmiy bilimning vaqt o'tishi bilan qanday rivojlanishi va to'planishi haqida tubdan farqli tushunchalarni ifodalaydi.

items.text: Contemporary discourse on postcolonial identity politics interrogates the hegemonic narratives that have historically marginalized indigenous perspectives. The decolonization of knowledge production requires a fundamental reconceptualization of academic institutions and their epistemic hierarchies.
items.translation_uz: Postkolonial identitet siyosati bo'yicha zamonaviy diskurs tarixan mahalliy nuqtai nazarlarni chetlab o'tgan hegemonik hikoyalarni so'roq qiladi. Bilim ishlab chiqarishni dekolonizatsiya qilish akademik institutlar va ularning epistemik iyerarxiyalarini tubdan qayta kontseptsiyalashtirishni talab qiladi.

items.text: The phenomenological approach to consciousness, as articulated by Husserl and subsequently developed by Heidegger, challenges the Cartesian dualism that has dominated Western philosophy. Intentionality, the directedness of consciousness toward objects, constitutes a fundamental characteristic of mental states.
items.translation_uz: Gusserl tomonidan ifodalangan va keyinchalik Xaydegger tomonidan rivojlantirilgan ongga fenomenologik yondashuv G'arb falsafasida hukmronlik qilgan Dekart dualizmiga qarshi turadi. Intensionallik, ongning ob'ektlarga yo'naltirilganligi, ruhiy holatlarning fundamental xususiyatini tashkil qiladi.

items.text: The anthropocene hypothesis posits that human activity has become the dominant geological force shaping Earth's systems. Stratigraphic evidence suggests unprecedented levels of anthropogenic intervention in biogeochemical cycles, warranting recognition of a new geological epoch.
items.translation_uz: Antroposen gipotezasi inson faoliyati Yer tizimlarini shakllantiruvchi dominant geologik kuchga aylanganini taklif qiladi. Stratigrafik dalillar biogeo-kimyoviy tsikllarga antropogen aralashuvning misli ko'rilmagan darajasini ko'rsatadi, bu yangi geologik davrni tan olishni talab qiladi.

items.text: Foucault's genealogical method excavates the historical conditions of possibility for contemporary institutions and discursive practices. Power, in this framework, operates not merely through repression but through the productive constitution of subjects and the normalization of particular modes of existence.
items.translation_uz: Fukoning genealogik usuli zamonaviy institutlar va diskursiv amaliyotlar uchun tarixiy imkoniyat sharoitlarini ochib beradi. Ushbu tizimda hokimiyat nafaqat qatag'on orqali, balki sub'ektlarning samarali tashkil etilishi va mavjudlikning ma'lum rejimlarini normallashtirish orqali ishlaydi.

items.text: The mathematical formalization of quantum field theory necessitates sophisticated techniques from differential geometry and functional analysis. Renormalization procedures, though initially perceived as ad hoc mathematical manipulations, have subsequently been understood as reflecting genuine physical insights about scale dependence.
items.translation_uz: Kvant maydon nazariyasining matematik rasmiylashtirishi differentsial geometriya va funktsional tahlildan murakkab usullarni talab qiladi. Renormalizatsiya protseduralari, dastlab vaqtinchalik matematik manipulyatsiyalar sifatida qabul qilingan bo'lsa-da, keyinchalik masshtab bog'liqlik haqidagi haqiqiy fizik tushunchalarni aks ettirganligi tushunildi.

items.text: The hermeneutical tradition in the humanities emphasizes the interpretive nature of understanding and the historical situatedness of all knowledge claims. Gadamer's concept of effective historical consciousness illuminates how prejudices and presuppositions inevitably shape our engagement with texts and traditions.
items.translation_uz: Gumanitar fanlardagi germenevtik an'ana tushunishning talqiniy tabiatini va barcha bilim da'volarining tarixiy joylashganligini ta'kidlaydi. Gadamerning samarali tarixiy ong tushunchasi xurofotlar va oldindan taxminlar matnlar va an'analar bilan muloqotimizni qanday muqarrar ravishda shakllantirishini yoritib beradi.

items.text: Emergent properties in complex systems cannot be predicted from or reduced to the behavior of their constituent elements, challenging reductionist methodologies prevalent in natural science. Self-organization and nonlinear dynamics generate novel structures and behaviors at higher levels of description.
items.translation_uz: Murakkab tizimlardagi paydo bo'luvchi xususiyatlar ularning tarkibiy elementlarining xatti-harakatlaridan bashorat qilinishi yoki ularga qisqartirilishi mumkin emas, bu tabiiy fanda keng tarqalgan reduktionist metodologiyalarga qarshi turadi. O'z-o'zini tashkil qilish va nochiziqli dinamika yuqori tavsif darajalarida yangi tuzilmalar va xatti-harakatlarni yaratadi.
